title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Computer Science and Human-Computer Interaction for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners design three or more blended learning modules (theory+practice) by linking an LMS (corporate internal system) with MOOC platforms (edX, Coursera, etc.), implement them for 10 learners over 40 years old over two months, and achieve over 80% learning satisfaction and 70% completion rate
Apply intermediate concepts in computer science and human-computer interaction (HCI) (e.g., user experience design, interface principles) through real-world case analysis.

Learners form teams of three peer learners using collaboration tools (GitHub, Slack) on a MOOC platform, solve five real-world problems (e.g., code refactoring, system design) through feedback exchanges twice weekly over six months, and submit a final report meeting three or more of four problem-solving process stages (problem definition, solution derivation, implementation, verification) in evaluations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
